H2.text: who sang on the back in black album. Axl Rose

H3.text: who sang on the back in black album. Brian Johnson

A4.text: Johnson's first album with AC/DC, Back in Black, became the second-best-selling album of all time, according to most estimates.

A5.text: The result was the album Back in Black, which was released in July that year.
